info.name: Remove Google Top Bar
info.description:
Removes the bar on top of Google websites.

Prevent the waste of screen real estate by an advertisement bar of Google products.
This is specially useful on websites like Gmail, where space is really needed to display a good ammount of information.
info.additionalInfo: Works on: Gmail, Google Search, Maps, News, Images, Translate. It may work on several other Google websites, but they won't be added to the CSS unless they have been tested. If you edit the CSS and test other Google websites, please report them here if you'd like to see them added to this user style. Updates 2012.07.06 - Added: images, translate 2012.09.21 - Removed: docs, drive
